CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 16,17 Up to now , PCEs of the polymer solar cells incorporating BT / BO derivatives have reached 6-7 % , and hole mobilities of OFETs based on BT - containing polymers have been up to 1 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 after systematic optimization.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. BT (Butylene terephthalate)
2. BO (Benzene oxide)
3. PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency)
4. OFET (Organic Field-Effect Transistor)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure! Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph:

1. BT
2. BO

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| BT |
| BO |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 16,17 Up to now , PCEs of the polymer solar cells incorporating BT / BO derivatives have reached 6-7 % , and hole mobilities of OFETs based on BT - containing polymers have been up to 1 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 after systematic optimization.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. PCEs (Power Conversion Efficiency)
2. BT (Bithiophene)
3. BO (Bornoprene)
4. OFETs (Organic Field-Effect Transistors)
5. hole mobilities (Hole Mobility)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure! Here are the relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties:

1. BT (Bithiophene)
2. BO (Bornoprene)
3. PCEs (Power Conversion Efficiency)

These are the entities that clearly refer to material properties, such as the type of polymer used in the solar cells (BT and BO) and the efficiency of the solar cells (PCEs).

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| BT |
| BO |
| PCEs |

I have presented the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph. Let me know if you have any further questions!

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 16,17 Up to now , PCEs of the polymer solar cells incorporating BT / BO derivatives have reached 6-7 % , and hole mobilities of OFETs based on BT - containing polymers have been up to 1 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 after systematic optimization.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Value" entities:

1. 6-7% - This is the percentage value of the PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) of the polymer solar cells incorporating BT / BO derivatives.
2. 1 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 - This is the value of the hole mobility of OFETs (Organic Field-Effect Transistors) based on BT-containing polymers after systematic optimization.

Therefore, the two "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

1. 6-7%
2. 1 cm^2 V -1 s^-1
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. 6-7% - This is the percentage value of the PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) of the polymer solar cells incorporating BT / BO derivatives.

Therefore, the only entity that refers to the value of a material property in the paragraph is:

1. 6-7%

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 6-7% |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
